Package com.composum.pages.options.microsite.service.impl

Interface MicrositeImportProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MicrositeImportServiceImpl.RepositoryImportProvider
    public interface MicrositeImportProvider
    the import provider for the ZIP file based site import into one page - implemented for the repository and as mock object for unit testing

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getProperty

        <T> T getProperty​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
                  String name,
                  T defaultValue)
        retrieves a property value from a (probably not commited) resource
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the property value
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource object
        name - the property name (elative path)
        defaultValue - the value if the property is not set)
        Returns:
        the current value or the default value if no such property exists

      • setProperty

        void setProperty​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
                 String name,
                 Object value)
        stores property values in a resource
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to modify
        name - the property name (elative path)
        value - the value - property will be removed if this value is null

      • clearContent

        void clearContent​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource contentRoot)
           throws org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
        clear the ZIP parent resource and remove all content imported before
        Parameters:
        contentRoot - the content resource of the landing page
        Throws:
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException - if an error occurs

      • createFolder

        void createFolder​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource contentRoot,
                  String path)
           throws org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
        creates a 'folder' if not always available
        Parameters:
        contentRoot - the content resource of the landing page
        path - the folder path relative to the content root
        Throws:
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException - if an error occurs

      • storeSourceFile

        void storeSourceFile​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource parentResource,
                     String name,
                     String sourceContent)
              throws IOException
        save an imported source file as child of the given parent resource
        Parameters:
        parentResource - the parent resource of the file
        name - the filename
        sourceContent - the content of the file (String, encoding=UTF-8)
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs

                     String name,
                     InputStream content)
              throws IOException
        save an imported binary file as child of the given parent resource
        Parameters:
        parentResource - the parent resource of the file
        name - the filename
        content - the content of the file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs
